articles.description: The fashion designer came under fire for choosing to apply for the government's scheme.

articles.author: Zara Zubeidi
articles.title: Emmerdale and Coronation Street’s older cast could be banned from set due to coronavirus when soaps return to - The Sun
articles.content:
SOAP bosses have said some of Emmerdale and Coronation Streets high-risk, older cast members could be banned from set once filming resumes.
ITV programme boss Kevin Lygo said he didnt want actors like Corries William Roache, who plays Ken Barlow, or Chris Ch… [+3502 chars]

articles.author: By Jason Chester for MailOnline
articles.title: Bucks Fizz to reunite for virtual performance after Eurovision Song Contest was axed - Daily Mail
articles.description: The eighties pop group - now renamed The Fizz - were poised for a return to the stage that helped turn them into household names when the long-running annual event kicked off in Rotterdam.
articles.content:
Bucks Fizz will perform from home on May 16 as part of a virtual show arranged by organisers of the cancelled Eurovision Song Contest.
The eighties pop group now renamed The Fizz were poised for a return to the stage that helped turn them into household name… [+4401 chars]

articles.author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
articles.title: Tony Allen: 'World's greatest drummer' and afrobeat pioneer dies - BBC News
articles.description: The Nigerian musician created afrobeat with Fela Kuti and gave it its distinctive rhythms.
articles.content:
Image copyrightAFP/Getty ImagesImage caption
 Tony Allen has been described as "perhaps the greatest drummer who has ever lived"
Pioneering Nigerian drummer Tony Allen, a co-founder of the afrobeat musical genre, died in Paris on Thursday aged 79, his manag… [+4388 chars]

articles.title: The Best Deals in Lego's Star Wars-Themed May 4th Sale - Gizmodo UK
articles.description: May 4th means lightsabers, memes, and sales. Here are the best Star Wars deals you can get from everyone's favourite block-themed construction toy company.
articles.content: It's almost May the 4th, and while it may seem like Disney wishes it could own this day and everything to do with it, it remains that day where all the big companies go all in on Star Wars. Be it social media references, Fellow Kids-worthy memes, big announce… [+2334 chars]

articles.title: Rishi Kapoor: looking back at the Bollywood icon's memorable roles – video - The Guardian
articles.description: Bollywood actor Rishi Kapoor, famed for his romantic roles and singing talents, has died of cancer aged 67
articles.content: The celebrated Bollywood actor Rishi Kapoor, famed for his romantic roles, has died of cancer aged 67. Kapoor began acting as a teenager and received the National Film Award for his debut role as a child artist in his fathers 1970 film Mera Naam Joker. He wen… [+93 chars]
